name: Dark Feedly (Hauschild's)
description: For night reading! The same Feedly you know, only dark. Rewritten for 2019.
additional_info:
I wanted to read with dim lights around the house and not be blinded by Feedly's light interface. Only colors were changed.

IMPORTANT! - You must select a dark background theme on Feedly's settings.

UPDATES:
2019-10-25 - Small update to header stylings
2019-09-25 - Since Feedly now has a dark theme, this was simplified. It now just changes the title and link color, together with a couple other small things.
2018-05-05 - Fix for add feed menu, organize page tweaks, sticky header fix.
2017-11-01 - Small fixes for text colors on some feeds
2017-09-07 - Small fixes for the empty state
2017-08-06 - Rewritten the entire theme. There are now CSS variables for the link color
2017-06-17 - Fixed a few background colors broken by feedly's update.
2016-11-19 - Fixed a typo that killed some header styles.
2016-11-18 - Updated for new feedly styles.
2014-12-20 - Updated new entry picture styles.
2014-11-11 - Updated .u100frame and .entryholder.
2014-08-24 - Updated Slider.
2014-04-02 - FeedlyPro display updated.
2014-03-20 - Minor usability updates. Floating top bar color fix.
2014-03-19 - Updated for Feedly v19.
2014-02-23 - Updated for Feedly v18.
2014-01-25 - Updated for Feedly v17.11. - Changed the "Mark all as read" button colors.
2013-12-04 - Updated link styles for Feedly v17.5.
2013-10-22 - Tweaked loading animation.
2013-09-18 - Tweaks for closer visual identity to stock Feedly.
2013-08-04 - Updated Cards View to theme colors.
2013-08-26 - Updated code for new search box! Plus a few color tweaks for a cleaner look.
2013-08-20 - Updated code for the new "visit website" button.
2013-05-07 - Read article title color tweak.
